trans-unit.source: Windows Universal SDK Overview
trans-unit.target: Windows Universal SDK Overview

trans-unit.source: Overview of the Windows Universal SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Overview of the Windows Universal SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: Windows Universal SDK Overview for Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Windows Universal SDK Overview for Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: Start here to get the details on how to integrate Azure Mobile Engagement in a Windows Universal App.
trans-unit.target: Start here to get the details on how to integrate Azure Mobile Engagement in a Windows Universal App.

trans-unit.source: If you'd like to give it a try first, make sure you complete our <link><linkText>15 minutes tutorial</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: If you'd like to give it a try first, make sure you complete our <link><linkText>15 minutes tutorial</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Click to see the <link><linkText>SDK Content</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: Click to see the <link><linkText>SDK Content</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Integration procedures
trans-unit.target: Integration procedures

trans-unit.source: Start here: <link><linkText>How to integrate Mobile Engagement in your Windows Universal app</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: Start here: <link><linkText>How to integrate Mobile Engagement in your Windows Universal app</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: For Notifications: <link><linkText>How to integrate Reach (Notifications) in your Windows Universal app</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: For Notifications: <link><linkText>How to integrate Reach (Notifications) in your Windows Universal app</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Tag plan implementation: <link><linkText>How to use the advanced Mobile Engagement tagging API in your Windows Universal app</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: Tag plan implementation: <link><linkText>How to use the advanced Mobile Engagement tagging API in your Windows Universal app</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Release notes
trans-unit.target: Release notes

trans-unit.source: The Mobile Engagement device id is now based on a GUID generated at installation time
trans-unit.target: The Mobile Engagement device id is now based on a GUID generated at installation time

trans-unit.source: For earlier version please see the <link><linkText>complete release notes</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: For earlier version please see the <link><linkText>complete release notes</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Upgrade procedures
trans-unit.target: Upgrade procedures

trans-unit.source: If you already have integrated an older version of Engagement into your application, you have to consider the following points when upgrading the SDK.
trans-unit.target: If you already have integrated an older version of Engagement into your application, you have to consider the following points when upgrading the SDK.

trans-unit.source: You may have to follow several procedures if you missed several versions of the SDK see the complete <link><linkText>Upgrade Procedures</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You may have to follow several procedures if you missed several versions of the SDK see the complete <link><linkText>Upgrade Procedures</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For example if you migrate from 0.10.1 to 0.11.0 you have to first follow the "from 0.9.0 to 0.10.1" procedure then the "from 0.10.1 to 0.11.0" procedure.
trans-unit.target: For example if you migrate from 0.10.1 to 0.11.0 you have to first follow the "from 0.9.0 to 0.10.1" procedure then the "from 0.10.1 to 0.11.0" procedure.

trans-unit.source: Resources
trans-unit.target: Resources

trans-unit.source: This step concerns customized resources only.
trans-unit.target: This step concerns customized resources only.

trans-unit.source: If you have customized the resources provided by the SDK (html, images, overlay) then you have to backup them before upgrading and reapply your customization on upgraded resources.
trans-unit.target: If you have customized the resources provided by the SDK (html, images, overlay) then you have to backup them before upgrading and reapply your customization on upgraded resources.

trans-unit.source: Upgrade from older versions
trans-unit.target: Upgrade from older versions

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>Upgrade Procedures</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>Upgrade Procedures</linkText><title></title></link>
